Package com.gmail.sharpcastle33.aspects

Class AspectManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.sharpcastle33.aspects.AspectManager

  • public class AspectManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the aspects.yaml file which is used to match custom items to a list of Aspect enums of various quantaties
